TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MailDefinition extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class MailDefinition Implements IStateManager
public ref class MailDefinition sealed : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 允许控件用文本文件或字符串创建电子邮件。

span.span: Allows a control to create email messages from text files or strings.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可以由控件用于创建从文本文件或包含电子邮件消息的正文的字符串对象。The class can be used by controls to create a object from a text file or a string that contains the body of the email message. 使用类来简化创建预定义的由控件发送的电子邮件。Use the class to simplify creating predefined email messages to be sent by a control. 如果你想要不使用控件发送电子邮件，请参阅类。If you want to send email not using a control, see the class. 你可以进行文本替换电子邮件消息的正文中传递给方法映射到它们的替换项的字符串的实例。You can make text substitutions in the body of the email message by passing to the method an instance that maps strings to their replacements. 创建对象使用发送类方法类。The object created by the class is sent using the method of the class. 若要能够发送电子邮件，则必须在 Web.config 文件中配置的 SMTP 邮件服务器。To be able to send email, you must configure an SMTP mail server in your Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ <smtp>元素 （网络设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md)。For more information, see the [<smtp> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md). > [!NOTE] > 类不支持数据绑定。The class does not support data binding. 属性的类不能绑定到数据使用`<%# %>`数据绑定表达式语法。Properties of the class cannot be bound to data using the `<%# %>` data-binding expression syntax. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从 Web 窗体页创建 Internet 电子邮件。The following code example creates an Internet email message from a Web Forms page. 你可以在窗体中输入消息的文本，或输入要用作邮件的正文的文本文件的名称。You can either enter the text of the message in the form or enter the name of a text file to use as the body of the mail. 该代码定义了消息的两个字符串替换： 从窗体的文本框到收件人列表将替换字符串"\<%到 %>"，并在指定的文本属性将替换字符串"\<从 %%>"。The code defines two string replacements for the message: the recipient list from the form's To text box will replace the string "\<%To%>", and the text specified in the property will replace the string "\<%From%>". 在此代码生成 Web 窗体页上，你可以单击**创建电子邮件并仅显示**创建电子邮件和显示的属性网页中的对象。On the Web Forms page that this code generates, you can click **Create email and display only** to create an email message and display the properties of the object in the Web page. 单击**创建电子邮件和发送**同时显示网页中的电子邮件并将消息发送到使用 Internet 电子邮件的收件人。Click **Create email and send** to both display the email message in the Web page and send the message to the recipients using Internet email. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控件具有一个接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This control has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BodyFileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含电子邮件正文文本的文件的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the file that contains text for the body of the email message.

value.span: 包含邮件正文文本的文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the file that contains the message body text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定要用于电子邮件消息的正文的文本文件的位置。The property specifies the location of the text file to use for the body of the email message. 方法使用其`owner`要映射参数到服务器上的路径的属性。The method uses its `owner` parameter to map the property to a path on the server. 如果`owner`参数指向.aspx 页上的控件或页本身，属性指向的文本文件中的.aspx 页所在的目录。If the `owner` parameter points to a control on an .aspx page or to the page itself, the property points to a text file in the same directory as the .aspx page. 例如，如果的.aspx 页位于 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx，控件查找文本文件中的目录 C:\inetpub\wwwroot。For example, if the .aspx page is located at C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx, the control looks for the text file in the directory C:\inetpub\wwwroot. 如果.ascx 文件中包含用户控件中使用类属性指向位于与用户控件相同的目录中的文本文件。If the class is used in a user control contained in an .ascx file, the property points to a text file located in the same directory as the user control. 例如，如果的.aspx 页位于 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx 和用户控件是在 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls\control.aspx，文本文件 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls 的目录中查找对象。For example, if the .aspx page is located at C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx and the user control is at C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls\control.aspx, the object looks for the text file in the directory C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性中输入的文本Web 窗体页上的控件。The following code example sets the property to the text entered in a control on a Web Forms page. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CC { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将邮件的抄送件 (CC) 发送到的电子邮件地址的逗号分隔列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of email addresses to send a copy (CC) of the message to.

value.span: 逗号分隔的电子邮件地址以将发送到消息的副本 (CC) 列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of email addresses to send a copy (CC) of the message to.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含的其他收件人的电子邮件消息列表。The property contains a list of additional recipients of the email message. 如果属性包含格式不正确的电子邮件地址，方法抛出异常异常和电子邮件消息不会发送。If the property contains an improperly formed email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性中输入的文本Web 窗体页上的控件。The following code example sets the property to the text entered in a control on a Web Forms page. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 创建通过 SMTP（简单邮件传输协议）发送的电子邮件。

span.span: Creates an email message to send by means of SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.Mail.MailMessage CreateMailMessage (string recipients, System.Collections.IDictionary replacements, System.Web.UI.Control owner);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.Mail.MailMessage CreateMailMessage(string recipients, class System.Collections.IDictionary replacements, class System.Web.UI.Control owner) cil managed
Public Function CreateMailMessage (recipients As String, replacements As IDictionary, owner As Control) As MailMessage
public: System::Net::Mail::MailMessage ^ CreateMailMessage(System::String ^ recipients, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ replacements, System::Web::UI::Control ^ owner);

param.name: recipients
param.span: 用逗号分隔的邮件收件人列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of message recipients.

param.name: replacements
param.span: ，包含字符串及其替换字符串的列表。

span.span: An containing a list of strings and their replacement strings.
The that owns this .

summary.span: 用文本文件创建通过 SMTP（简单邮件传输协议）发送的电子邮件。

span.span: Creates an email message from a text file to send by means of SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).

returns.span: 来自一个文本文件的电子邮件。

span.span: The email message from a text file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个新可以使用发送的对象方法。The method creates a new object that can be sent using the method. 必须设置属性以指示是否应以纯文本格式电子邮件 () 或 HTML ()。The property must be set to indicate whether the mail message should be formatted as plain text () or HTML (). `recipients`参数包含以逗号分隔的电子邮件收件人列表。The `recipients` parameter contains a comma-separated list of recipients of the email message. 如果`recipients`参数包含格式不正确的 Internet 电子邮件地址，方法抛出异常异常和电子邮件消息不会发送。If the `recipients` parameter contains an improperly formatted Internet email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. `replacements`参数是实例，其中包含要替换的字符串列表。The `replacements` parameter is an instance that contains a list of strings to substitute. 字符串将替换为添加到的顺序集合，并且它们可以覆盖以前的替换。Strings are replaced in the order in which they were added to the collection, and they can overwrite earlier replacements. `owner`参数指示哪个控件是的父控件。The `owner` parameter indicates which control is the parent of the control. 它确定在哪个目录，搜索中指定的文本文件属性。It determines which directory to search for the text file specified in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建对象，用于定义两个字符串 ("\<%到 %>"和"\<从 %%>")，替换电子邮件中。The following code example creates a object that defines two strings ("\<%To%>" and "\<%From%>") that are replaced in the email message. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#7)] 下面的代码示例使用方法来从文本文件中创建新的电子邮件。The following code example uses the method to create a new email message from a text file. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#8)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#8)]

exception.span: 配置文件的 SMTP 节中的 值为 或是一个空字符串。

span.span: The value in the SMTP section of the configuration file is or the empty string
\- or -

summary.span: 用文本文件创建通过 SMTP（简单邮件传输协议）发送的带有替换内容的电子邮件。

span.span: Creates an email message with replacements from a text file to send by means of SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).

returns.span: 来自一个文本文件的带有替换内容的电子邮件。

span.span: The email message with replacements from a text file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个新可以发送具有发送的对象方法。The method creates a new object that can be sent with the method. `recipients`参数包含以逗号分隔的电子邮件收件人列表。The `recipients` parameter contains a comma-separated list of recipients of the email message. 如果`recipients`参数包含格式不正确的 Internet 电子邮件地址，方法抛出异常异常和电子邮件消息不会发送。If the `recipients` parameter contains an improperly formatted Internet email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. `replacements`参数是实例，其中包含要替换的字符串列表。The `replacements` parameter is an instance that contains a list of strings to substitute. 字符串将替换为添加到的顺序集合，并且它们可以覆盖以前的替换。Strings are replaced in the order in which they were added to the collection, and they can overwrite earlier replacements. `body`参数包含电子邮件消息的文本。The `body` parameter contains the text of the email message. `owner`参数指示哪个控件是的父控件。The `owner` parameter indicates which control is the parent of the control. 它确定在哪个目录，搜索中指定的文本文件属性。It determines which directory to search for the text file specified in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建对象，用于定义两个字符串 ("\<%到 %>"和"\<从 %%>")，替换电子邮件中。The following code example creates a object that defines two strings ("\<%To%>" and "\<%From%>") that are replaced in the email message. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取 实例的集合，这些实例通常用于在将电子邮件发送给用户前，将图像嵌入到 对象中。

value.span: 实例用于嵌入图像之前向用户发送一封电子邮件的对象。

span.span: An instances used to embed images in a object before sending an email to a user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的项返回集合属性表示要在电子邮件消息中嵌入的项。The items in the collection returned by the property represent items to embed in an email message. 这些项可以包含如公司徽标的图像文件或其他图形。These items can include image files such as company logos or other graphics.
